p: Heatwaves are also seen as an increasingly dangerous climatic hazard since both, warm days and nights have increased globally ( EEA, 2016, IPCC, 2014). Heatwaves are expected to occur more often and last longer (IPCC, Op. cit.), and Southern Europe is expected to be the most affected area in terms of hot weather, experiencing the highest heatwave exposure (IPCC, Op. cit.).
